issue.title: unique_ptr does not define operator<< for stream output

discussion.p: shared_ptr does define operator<<, and unique_ptr should too, for consistency and usability reasons.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4659.

li.p: Change , class template unique_ptr synopsis, as indicated:
Add a new subclause following subclause as indicated:

pre.ins: template<class E, class T, class Y, class D> basic_ostream<E, T>& operator<< (basic_ostream<E, T>& os, const unique_ptr<Y, D>& p);

p.ins: -?- Remarks: This function shall not participate in overload resolution unless os << p.get() is a valid expression.
